table_summary: This table provides a summary of financial and risk metrics for various industries. It includes the number of firms in each industry, their beta values, debt-to-equity ratios, effective tax rates, unlevered beta values, cash as a percentage of firm value, unlevered beta values corrected for cash, high-low risk measures, standard deviations of equity, and standard deviations in operating income over the last 10 years. This data can be used to analyze the financial health and risk profiles of different industries.
